revised_title: The True Fructification of Carboniferous Calamites: New Evidence and Classification
tldr: The author examines the true fructification of Carboniferous Calamites using newly discovered specimens and concludes that Calamostachys Binneyana is not the correct relationship to Calamites. The study supports the classification of the Calamitean group as Equisetiform and confirms the Arthropitean type as Gymnosperms.
